about.body: **Land of Hop** is a web application which I develop to practice programming skills (React, Gatsby, Node.js, MongoDB). It is catalog of beers which I have drunk since October 2017. Unfortunatelly it doesn't work as I wish yet. I work on it [almost every single day](https://github.com/tomekrozalski). I hope on May 2020 it will be ready. At least the most basic functionalities. [Tomek Różalski](http://tomaszrozalski.pl)

details.cooperation: {contract, select, contract {} other {Uwarzono}} in cooperation with {cooperation}
